title: Wireframing
paragraph: When I start a new website project, I first draw out and plan all the pages of the website on paper.

title: Designing
paragraph: After wireframing, I begin designing an initial design in Figma.

title: Prototyping
paragraph: When Iâ€™m finished creating my initial design in Figma, I begin prototyping with micro interactions and page animations.

title: Programming
paragraph: Programming the website is the longest part, in this stage, I manage code, add features, and work effectively.

title: Assessment
paragraph: After Programming, I test for bugs, check issues with connecting to a database, and try and optimize speed.

title: Deploying
paragraph: The last stage of my creation process, I migrate my code to a hosting site or VPS and watch as the website goes online.
